job.title: Front-End Software Engineer
job.description: At AgileMD we are building the most advanced realtime predictive analytics and clinical algorithms platform for hospitals Our cloudbased engine helps thousands of doctors and nurses around the country make medical decisions so that every patient receives the highest quality and value of care based on the latest medical knowledge and dataltbrgtltbrgtAgileMD is a uniquely challenging product We take the most complex workflows that health institutions have and give the people managing those workflows a simple beautiful interface for managing them We deliver the same for pointofcare decision support tools that analyze massive amounts of data and provide medical staff with an easily digestible actionable and intuitive interfaces for ensuring patients get the highest quality of care Healthcare has traditionally left users in the dust with horrible UIs bad experiences and few alternatives  this is unacceptable so we are bringing the best tools to those who need it mostltbrgtltbrgtWere looking for engineers who are excited by these challenges who design wellthought out highlymaintainable code bases and know how to build one in a teambased setting Youll be joining a lean engineering team and stepping into a role with high expectations broad flexibility and responsibility and comprehensive support to help you succeed Our product road map is full of opportunities to solve hard problems that truly touch and change the course of patient lives We need a perpetual learner with an appetite for challenges to join our teamltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou willltbrgtltulgt ltligtWork closely with our engineers front and back end to develop beautiful fast modern front end applications built on React SCSS webpack and other modern toolsltligt ltligtWork closely with our Product and QA teams to deliver beautifully crafted and stable solutions to our customers most important needsltligt ltligtTake ownership and responsibility for building shipping and maintaining core features end to endltligt ltligtDesign and architect complex systems focusing on performance scalability security and crafting a beautiful user experienceltligt ltligtMaintain stellar security by abiding by OWASP standards participating in penetration and security tests and performing security reviews of projects from inception to completionltligt ltligtBuild and extend welldocumented and tested code that is easy to extend and hard to breakltligt ltligtHave the opportunity to expand your skillset and learn from our team whether that be backend devops or deepening your knowledge of the frontendltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtWho you areltbrgtltulgt ltligtYou are an experienced frontend software engineer who cares deeply about code quality maintainability and the end productltligt ltligtYou have a natural curiosity and a desire to build and improve beautiful intuitive products for our customersltligt ltligtYou have deep knowledge of web technologies and experience building largescale web applications for modern and legacy browsing environmentsltligt ltligtYou have a strong background in computer science via formal education selfteaching or other methods 4 years of experienceltligt ltligtYou take a thoughtful approach to decision making knowing when to move fast and when to do things rightltligt ltligtYou are excited by and see the importance in the problems we are solvingltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltugtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltstronggtltugtltulgt ltligtWork with a team that you can rely on that constantly challenges you and that gives the tools to succeed and the responsibility to prove that you canltligt ltligt90000  160000 02  05 equity depending on experience and existing skillsltligt ltligtHealth dental and vision insurance for you and your familyltligt ltligtPaid time off 6 holidays plus as much vacation as you need most people take three or four weeks per yearltligt ltligtMaternitypaternity leave 10 weeks at 100 salary 10 weeks at 50 salaryltligt ltligt500 per quarter for selfdirected personal development books conference tickets etcltligtltulgt
